questions.title: Who am I?
questions.description: I'm passionate about new technologies. A person who tries to push his limits and never give up. A programmer who wants to know as much as possible.

questions.title: What I do?
questions.description: I create websites, web applications and mock-ups. Check my offer. Maybe you will be interest in something.

questions.title: What have I done?
questions.description: I have already created many websites and web applications based on various technologies. I have also designed several mock-ups. Check it out.
